structure.unit: Fires, Fire Departments And Fire Districts

law.catch_line: Establishment Of Fire Departments In Districts; Duties Of Officers
law.text: Fire departments may be established in districts containing not less than one thousand inhabitants, or not less than five hundred inhabitants in towns the population of which does not exceed two thousand; and the officers thereof shall have charge of and be responsible for the apparatus for the extinguishment of fire therein, in the same manner as firewards and enginemen of towns.
